resources.string: A bottom app bar provides a docked bar at the bottom of the screen for common application actions. The bottom app bar includes a floating button for a primary action and a navigation bar area for secondary actions.

string.name: cat_bottomappbar_scroll_hide
string.description: Name of the FAB Hide on Scroll Mode switch [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Hide bottom app bar on scroll

string.name: cat_bottomappbar_fab_alignment_mode
string.description: Name of the FAB Alignment Mode toggle button group [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_bottomappbar_fab_animation_mode
string.description: Name of the FAB Animation Mode toggle button group [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_bottomappbar_fab_visibility_mode
string.description: Name of the FAB Visibility Mode toggle button group [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_bottomappbar_fab_anchor_mode
string.description: Name of the FAB Anchor Mode toggle button group [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_bottomappbar_menu_alignment
string.description: Name of the Menu Alignment toggle button group [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_bottomappbar_button_embed
string.description: Name of the option to embed the FAB inside the BottomAppBar [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_bottomappbar_button_cradle
string.description: Name of the option to cradle the FAB on top of the BottomAppBar [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_bottomappbar_button_menu_alignment_auto
string.description: Name of the option to set the menu item alignment to be automatic [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_bottomappbar_button_menu_alignment_start
string.description: Name of the option to set the menu item alignment to be start-aligned [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
